integration_plan.name: FreeAstrologyAPI.com Integration - Vedic Engine Migration
integration_plan.description: Comprehensive plan to migrate native Vedic astrology calculations to FreeAstrologyAPI.com endpoints for Panchanga, Vimshottari, Navamsa, and related features

phases.name: Phase 1: API Client Foundation
phases.description: Build the HTTP client, authentication, and error handling for FreeAstrologyAPI

tasks.title: Create FreeAstrologyAPI client module
tasks.description: Create new crate/module for FreeAstrologyAPI integration
tasks.acceptance: Module compiles, exports client struct

tasks.title: Define API configuration struct
tasks.description: Create config for API key, base URL, timeout, retry settings
tasks.acceptance: Config loads from env vars, validates API key

tasks.title: Implement HTTP client with reqwest
tasks.description: Create async HTTP client with proper headers and timeout
tasks.acceptance: Client makes successful HTTP requests, handles timeouts

tasks.title: Implement API key authentication
tasks.description: Add API key header to all requests
tasks.acceptance: API key included in Authorization header

tasks.title: Create error handling types
tasks.description: Define ApiError enum for various failure modes
tasks.acceptance: Errors properly categorized: Network, RateLimit, InvalidInput, ApiError

tasks.title: Implement retry logic with exponential backoff
tasks.description: Retry failed requests with exponential backoff for 5xx errors
tasks.acceptance: Retries 3 times, respects 429 rate limit headers

tasks.title: Add request/response logging
tasks.description: Log API calls for debugging with sensitive data redaction
tasks.acceptance: Logs show request URL, response time, status, API key masked

tasks.title: Implement circuit breaker pattern
tasks.description: Circuit breaker for when API is down or rate limited
tasks.acceptance: Opens after 5 failures, closes after recovery period

tasks.title: Create response cache layer
tasks.description: Cache API responses to reduce calls and improve speed
tasks.acceptance: TTL-based caching, cache key from request params

tasks.title: Write client unit tests
tasks.description: Test client with mock server
tasks.acceptance: 90%+ coverage, mock server tests pass

phases.name: Phase 2: Panchang API Integration
phases.description: Integrate Panchang endpoints for Tithi, Nakshatra, Yoga, Karana, and Muhurtas

tasks.title: Define Panchang request/response types
tasks.description: Create structs for Panchang API request and response
tasks.acceptance: Types match API response schema exactly

tasks.title: Implement GET /panchang endpoint call
tasks.description: Call Panchang API with date, time, lat, lng, timezone
tasks.acceptance: Returns Tithi, Nakshatra, Yoga, Karana, Vara

tasks.title: Map API Tithi response to internal model
tasks.description: Convert API tithi data to engine-panchanga Tithi struct
tasks.acceptance: All 30 tithis mapped correctly with paksha

tasks.title: Map API Nakshatra response to internal model
tasks.description: Convert API nakshatra data with pada information
tasks.acceptance: All 27 nakshatras mapped with lords and padas

tasks.title: Map API Yoga response to internal model
tasks.description: Convert API yoga data
tasks.acceptance: All 27 yogas mapped

tasks.title: Map API Karana response to internal model
tasks.description: Convert API karana data
tasks.acceptance: All 11 karanas mapped correctly

tasks.title: Implement GET /sunrise-sunset endpoint
tasks.description: Get sunrise and sunset times for location
tasks.acceptance: Returns accurate sunrise/sunset for Bengaluru test date

tasks.title: Implement GET /abhijit-muhurta endpoint
tasks.description: Get Abhijit Muhurta (victorious midday) timing
tasks.acceptance: Returns start/end times for Abhijit Muhurta

tasks.title: Implement GET /amrit-kaal endpoint
tasks.description: Get Amrit Kaal (nectar time) for auspicious beginnings
tasks.acceptance: Returns Amrit Kaal timings

tasks.title: Implement GET /rahu-kalam endpoint
tasks.description: Get Rahu Kalam (inauspicious period) timing
tasks.acceptance: Returns Rahu Kalam for day of week

tasks.title: Implement GET /yama-gandam endpoint
tasks.description: Get Yama Gandam (death time) to avoid
tasks.acceptance: Returns Yama Gandam timings

tasks.title: Implement GET /gulika-kaal endpoint
tasks.description: Get Gulika Kaal (son of Saturn) timing
tasks.acceptance: Returns Gulika rising time

tasks.title: Implement GET /hora-timings endpoint
tasks.description: Get planetary hour (Hora) timings for the day
tasks.acceptance: Returns all 24 horas with planetary lords

tasks.title: Implement GET /choghadiya endpoint
tasks.description: Get Choghadiya Muhurtas (auspicious/inauspicious periods)
tasks.acceptance: Returns day and night choghadiya with nature

tasks.title: Implement GET /varjyam endpoint
tasks.description: Get Varjyam (avoidable period) timings
tasks.acceptance: Returns Varjyam start/end times

tasks.title: Implement GET /dur-muhurta endpoint
tasks.description: Get Dur Muhurta (bad times) to avoid
tasks.acceptance: Returns Dur Muhurta timings

tasks.title: Implement GET /brahma-muhurta endpoint
tasks.description: Get Brahma Muhurta (creator's time) for meditation
tasks.acceptance: Returns Brahma Muhurta time window

tasks.title: Create comprehensive Panchang DTO
tasks.description: Single DTO combining all Panchang elements
tasks.acceptance: Complete Panchang data structure with all fields

tasks.title: Write Panchang API integration tests
tasks.description: Test all Panchang endpoints with real API
tasks.acceptance: Tests pass with real API, validate against known data

tasks.title: Update engine-panchanga to use API
tasks.description: Refactor engine-panchanga to call FreeAstrologyAPI
tasks.acceptance: All existing tests pass, uses API for calculations

phases.name: Phase 3: Vimshottari Dasha API Integration
phases.description: Integrate Vimshottari Dasha endpoints for all levels of planetary periods

tasks.title: Define Vimshottari request/response types
tasks.description: Create structs for Dasha API request and response
tasks.acceptance: Types match API response for all Dasha levels

tasks.title: Implement POST /vimshottari-dasha endpoint
tasks.description: Call Vimshottari Dasha API with birth details
tasks.acceptance: Returns complete 120-year Dasha sequence

tasks.title: Support Maha Dasha only level
tasks.description: Fetch only Maha Dasha (main periods)
tasks.acceptance: dasha_type=maha-dasha returns 9 periods

tasks.title: Support Antar Dasha level
tasks.description: Fetch Antar Dasha (sub-periods) within each Maha Dasha
tasks.acceptance: dasha_type=antar-dasha returns 9x9=81 periods

tasks.title: Support Pratyantar Dasha level
tasks.description: Fetch Pratyantar Dasha (sub-sub-periods)
tasks.acceptance: dasha_type=pratyantar-dasha returns nested structure

tasks.title: Support Sookshma Dasha level
tasks.description: Fetch Sookshma Dasha (finest level periods)
tasks.acceptance: dasha_type=sookshma-dasha returns 4-level nested structure

tasks.title: Map API Mahadasha to internal model
tasks.description: Convert API Maha Dasha data to internal struct
tasks.acceptance: All 9 planets mapped with correct dates

tasks.title: Map API Antar Dasha to internal model
tasks.description: Convert API Antar Dasha nested structure
tasks.acceptance: Nested structure flattened and accessible

tasks.title: Implement current Dasha calculation
tasks.description: Find current Maha, Antar, Pratyantar Dasha for given date
tasks.acceptance: Returns correct current Dasha for test date 2026-02-03

tasks.title: Implement upcoming transitions
tasks.description: Find next N Dasha transitions
tasks.acceptance: Returns upcoming transitions with dates

tasks.title: Get Dasha lord by date
tasks.description: Find which planet rules a specific date
tasks.acceptance: Returns correct Dasha lord for any input date

tasks.title: Validate against birth data test
tasks.description: Test with Shesh's birth data: Nakshatra Uttara Phalguni, should start with Sun Maha Dasha
tasks.acceptance: Sun Dasha starts 1991-09-14, Mars Dasha 2008-09-13

tasks.title: Add Dasha quality/themes from wisdom
tasks.description: Enrich Dasha with planet qualities from wisdom docs
tasks.acceptance: Each Dasha period includes planet themes and keywords

tasks.title: Update engine-vimshottari to use API
tasks.description: Refactor engine-vimshottari to call FreeAstrologyAPI
tasks.acceptance: All existing tests pass, uses API for Dasha calculations

phases.name: Phase 4: Birth Chart (Kundli) API Integration
phases.description: Integrate birth chart endpoints for planet positions, houses, and dignities

tasks.title: Define Birth Chart request/response types
tasks.description: Create structs for Horoscope Chart API
tasks.acceptance: Types include planets, houses, aspects, dignities

tasks.title: Implement GET /horoscope-chart endpoint
tasks.description: Call Horoscope Chart API for Rashi chart (D1)
tasks.acceptance: Returns complete birth chart with all planets and houses

tasks.title: Map planet positions to internal model
tasks.description: Convert API planet data: sign, degree, nakshatra, pada
tasks.acceptance: All 9 planets mapped with accurate positions

tasks.title: Map house cusps to internal model
tasks.description: Convert API house data with sign and degree
tasks.acceptance: All 12 houses mapped with Ascendant

tasks.title: Extract dignity information
tasks.description: Map exalted, debilitated, moolatrikona, own sign status
tasks.acceptance: Each planet has dignity enum value

tasks.title: Extract retrograde and combustion info
tasks.description: Map retrograde, combust status for each planet
tasks.acceptance: Correctly identifies retrograde and combust planets

tasks.title: Calculate aspects between planets
tasks.description: Derive aspect relationships from positions
tasks.acceptance: Returns all planetary aspects with nature

tasks.title: Validate against test birth data
tasks.description: Test with Shesh's birth data: Ascendant Scorpio, Moon Virgo
tasks.acceptance: Ascendant matches Scorpio, Moon in Virgo/Uttara Phalguni

phases.name: Phase 5: Navamsa and Divisional Charts (Vargas)
phases.description: Integrate Navamsa (D9) and other divisional chart endpoints

tasks.title: Define Navamsa chart types
tasks.description: Create types for Navamsa (D9) chart data
tasks.acceptance: Types for D9 chart with planetary positions

tasks.title: Implement GET /navamsa-chart endpoint
tasks.description: Call Navamsa Chart API
tasks.acceptance: Returns D9 chart with all planets

tasks.title: Map Navamsa positions to internal model
tasks.description: Convert D9 positions for marriage/spirituality analysis
tasks.acceptance: All planets mapped to their Navamsa positions

tasks.title: Define general Varga (divisional chart) types
tasks.description: Create types for D1-D60 charts
tasks.acceptance: Types support D1, D2, D3, D7, D9, D10, D12, D16, D20, D24, D27, D30, D40, D45, D60

tasks.title: Implement GET /horoscope-chart with vargas parameter
tasks.description: Fetch specific divisional charts via parameter
tasks.acceptance: Can request D1, D9, D10, etc. individually

tasks.title: Implement D10 (Dasamsa) for career analysis
tasks.description: Get Dasamsa chart for profession analysis
tasks.acceptance: Returns D10 chart with career indicators

tasks.title: Implement D12 (Dwadasamsa) for parents
tasks.description: Get Dwadasamsa chart for parent lineage analysis
tasks.acceptance: Returns D12 chart

tasks.title: Implement D7 (Saptamsa) for children
tasks.description: Get Saptamsa chart for progeny analysis
tasks.acceptance: Returns D7 chart

tasks.title: Create Varga strength calculator
tasks.description: Calculate Varga Vimshopaka Bala (divisional chart strength)
tasks.acceptance: Returns strength score for each planet across vargas

tasks.title: Write Navamsa validation tests
tasks.description: Test Navamsa calculations against known data
tasks.acceptance: Navamsa positions accurate within tolerance

phases.name: Phase 6: Advanced Features - Yogas, Shadbala, Ashtakavarga
phases.description: Integrate advanced Vedic astrology features for deeper analysis

tasks.title: Define Yoga detection types
tasks.description: Create types for planetary yoga combinations
tasks.acceptance: Types for Raj Yogas, Dhana Yogas, etc.

tasks.title: Implement GET /yogas endpoint
tasks.description: Fetch planetary yoga combinations present in chart
tasks.acceptance: Returns list of yogas with strength

tasks.title: Map common Raj Yogas
tasks.description: Identify and map auspicious combinations
tasks.acceptance: Detects Gajakesari, Budha-Aditya, etc.

tasks.title: Map wealth-related Dhana Yogas
tasks.description: Identify wealth yoga combinations
tasks.acceptance: Detects wealth indicators from 2nd, 11th houses

tasks.title: Define Shadbala types
tasks.description: Create types for 6-fold planetary strength
tasks.acceptance: Types for Sthana Bala, Dig Bala, Kala Bala, etc.

tasks.title: Implement GET /shadbala endpoint
tasks.description: Fetch Shadbala calculations for all planets
tasks.acceptance: Returns 6-fold strength for each planet

tasks.title: Calculate total Shadbala and Rupas
tasks.description: Sum up all 6 balas for each planet
tasks.acceptance: Planet with highest Shadbala identified as strongest

tasks.title: Define Ashtakavarga types
tasks.description: Create types for Ashtakavarga (8-fold bindu) system
tasks.acceptance: Types for Sarva Ashtakavarga and planet-specific

tasks.title: Implement GET /ashtakavarga endpoint
tasks.description: Fetch Ashtakavarga bindu points
tasks.acceptance: Returns bindus for each planet in each house

tasks.title: Calculate Sarva Ashtakavarga totals
tasks.description: Sum bindus for total house strength
tasks.acceptance: House with 30+ bindus identified as strong

phases.name: Phase 7: Transit and Predictive Features
phases.description: Add transit calculations and predictive astrology features

tasks.title: Define transit calculation types
tasks.description: Create types for planetary transits
tasks.acceptance: Types for transit positions and aspects to natal

tasks.title: Implement GET /transits endpoint
tasks.description: Fetch current or specific date transit positions
tasks.acceptance: Returns all planet positions for transit date

tasks.title: Calculate transit aspects to natal chart
tasks.description: Find transiting planets aspecting natal positions
tasks.acceptance: Returns active transits with aspect nature

tasks.title: Identify Saturn transit (Sade Sati)
tasks.description: Detect if Saturn is in Sade Sati period
tasks.acceptance: Returns Sade Sati status: Rising/Peak/Setting/None

tasks.title: Identify Jupiter transit blessings
tasks.description: Find when Jupiter transits over natal planets
tasks.acceptance: Returns Guru Peyarchi (Jupiter transit) effects

tasks.title: Calculate upcoming transit dates
tasks.description: Find when planets will change signs or aspect
tasks.acceptance: Returns upcoming significant transit dates

tasks.title: Define progression types
tasks.description: Create types for secondary progressions
tasks.acceptance: Types for progressed chart

tasks.title: Implement progressed chart calculation
tasks.description: Calculate secondary progressions (day for a year)
tasks.acceptance: Returns progressed positions for age

phases.name: Phase 8: Muhurta (Electional Astrology)
phases.description: Integrate Muhurta endpoints for finding auspicious timings

tasks.title: Define Muhurta calculation types
tasks.description: Create types for electional astrology
tasks.acceptance: Types for auspicious/inauspicious time windows

tasks.title: Implement GET /muhurta endpoint
tasks.description: Find Muhurta for specific activity on given date
tasks.acceptance: Returns optimal time windows for activity

tasks.title: Calculate marriage Muhurta
tasks.description: Find auspicious times for wedding
tasks.acceptance: Considers Nakshatra, Tithi, avoid Mars hora

tasks.title: Calculate business Muhurta
tasks.description: Find auspicious times for starting business
tasks.acceptance: Considers 3rd, 10th house, strong Mercury/Jupiter

tasks.title: Calculate travel Muhurta
tasks.description: Find auspicious times for journey
tasks.acceptance: Avoids inauspicious yogas for travel

tasks.title: Calculate general activity Muhurta
tasks.description: Find good times for general activities
tasks.acceptance: Considers Abhijit Muhurta, avoids Rahu Kalam

phases.name: Phase 9: Vedic Clock Enhancement
phases.description: Enhance Vedic Clock with API-derived data for better accuracy

tasks.title: Enhance TCM organ clock with API data
tasks.description: Use API sunrise/sunset for accurate organ transitions
tasks.acceptance: Organ times based on actual sunrise not just 6AM

tasks.title: Add Hora-based recommendations to Vedic Clock
tasks.description: Use planetary hour for activity suggestions
tasks.acceptance: Current Hora lord influences recommendations

tasks.title: Integrate Choghadiya into Vedic Clock
tasks.description: Add Choghadiya Muhurta quality to time recommendations
tasks.acceptance: Time recommendations consider Choghadiya nature

tasks.title: Add Panchang quality to Vedic Clock
tasks.description: Integrate Tithi, Nakshatra quality into daily rhythm
tasks.acceptance: Daily overview includes Tithi and Nakshatra

tasks.title: Update engine-vedic-clock API integration
tasks.description: Refactor to use noesis-vedic-api crate
tasks.acceptance: All tests pass, uses API for astronomical data

phases.name: Phase 10: Integration and Testing
phases.description: Complete integration, testing, and validation against reference data

tasks.title: Create unified Vedic API service
tasks.description: Combine all API modules into unified service
tasks.acceptance: Single service provides all Vedic astrology features

tasks.title: Add API response mocking for tests
tasks.description: Create mock responses for unit testing without API calls
tasks.acceptance: Tests can run without internet/API key

tasks.title: Write comprehensive integration tests
tasks.description: Test all endpoints with real API
tasks.acceptance: All major endpoints tested, >80% coverage

tasks.title: Validate Panchang against JHora
tasks.description: Compare API results with JHora software for accuracy
tasks.acceptance: Tithi/Nakshatra within 1 degree of JHora

tasks.title: Validate Vimshottari against reference
tasks.description: Test Dasha dates against known ephemeris
tasks.acceptance: Dasha dates accurate within 1 day

tasks.title: Test with Shesh's birth data
tasks.description: Complete validation using profile.json data
tasks.acceptance: All values match expected from profile.json

tasks.title: Add API fallback to native calculation
tasks.description: If API fails, fall back to native engine
tasks.acceptance: Graceful degradation when API unavailable

tasks.title: Add metrics and monitoring
tasks.description: Track API usage, latency, error rates
tasks.acceptance: Prometheus metrics for API calls and cache hits

tasks.title: Update Cargo.toml dependencies
tasks.description: Add reqwest, serde, and other dependencies
tasks.acceptance: All dependencies resolve, builds successfully

tasks.title: Add workspace configuration
tasks.description: Add new crate to workspace Cargo.toml
tasks.acceptance: noesis-vedic-api included in workspace

tasks.title: Write API integration documentation
tasks.description: Document how to use the Vedic API crate
tasks.acceptance: Complete usage examples, configuration guide

tasks.title: Create environment configuration template
tasks.description: Add API key and settings to .env.example
tasks.acceptance: FREE_ASTROLOGY_API_KEY documented

tasks.title: Update Docker configuration for API key
tasks.description: Pass API key through Docker environment
tasks.acceptance: API key configurable via environment variable

tasks.title: Create API rate limit handling
tasks.description: Handle 429 responses gracefully
tasks.acceptance: Respects Retry-After header, queues requests

tasks.title: Implement batch request optimization
tasks.description: Combine multiple calculations in single request where possible
tasks.acceptance: Reduces API calls through intelligent batching

tasks.title: Add API versioning support
tasks.description: Handle API version in URLs
tasks.acceptance: API version configurable, defaults to v1

tasks.title: Write migration guide from native engines
tasks.description: Document how to migrate existing code
tasks.acceptance: Step-by-step migration instructions

tasks.title: Update CHANGELOG
tasks.description: Document API integration in changelog
tasks.acceptance: New features and breaking changes documented

tasks.title: Run full test suite
tasks.description: Execute all tests including integration tests
tasks.acceptance: All tests pass with real API

phases.name: Phase 11: New Features and Future Extensions
phases.description: Additional features that leverage the API for enhanced functionality

tasks.title: Create unified Vedic report generator
tasks.description: Generate comprehensive PDF report combining all Vedic features
tasks.acceptance: Single call generates complete Vedic analysis

tasks.title: Implement daily Panchang notification
tasks.description: Daily Panchang data for notifications/reminders
tasks.acceptance: Returns today's complete Panchang with recommendations

tasks.title: Create planetary hour alarm system
tasks.description: Find optimal times based on Hora throughout day
tasks.acceptance: Returns next favorable Hora for each planet

tasks.title: Implement Dasha change notifications
tasks.description: Alert when Dasha periods change
tasks.acceptance: Returns upcoming Dasha changes with dates

tasks.title: Create festival calendar integration
tasks.description: Indian festival dates based on Panchang
tasks.acceptance: Returns major festivals for year with dates

tasks.title: Implement eclipse prediction
tasks.description: Find upcoming solar and lunar eclipses
tasks.acceptance: Returns eclipse dates with visibility location

tasks.title: Add Tithi-based fasting recommendations
tasks.description: Ekadashi and other fasting days
tasks.acceptance: Returns upcoming fasting days with Tithi

tasks.title: Create Nakshatra-based name suggestion
tasks.description: Suggest syllables for naming based on birth Nakshatra
tasks.acceptance: Returns appropriate starting syllables

tasks.title: Implement planetary remedy suggestions
tasks.description: Suggest remedies for afflicted planets
tasks.acceptance: Returns gemstones, mantras, donations for planets

tasks.title: Final integration validation
tasks.description: Complete end-to-end testing of all features
tasks.acceptance: All 120 tasks complete, system production-ready

panchang: GET /amrit-kaal - Nectar time for auspicious work
vimshottari: POST /vimshottari-dasha - Complete Dasha with levels: maha, antar, pratyantar, sookshma
birth_chart: GET /horoscope-chart - Rashi chart (D1) with planets and houses
vargas: GET /horoscope-chart with varga param - Divisional charts D1-D60

key_benefits: Accurate calculations validated against standard ephemeris
No maintenance of complex astronomical calculations
Access to advanced features like Shadbala, Ashtakavarga
Reduced code complexity in our engines

migration_strategy.fallback: Native calculations as backup if API unavailable
migration_strategy.cache_strategy: Aggressive caching to minimize API calls
migration_strategy.testing: Validate API results against known good data before migration
